plays.text: Even Strength Goal Scored by Corey Perry assisted by Daniel Sedin and Brent Burns

videos.headline: All-Star Game a success for NHL
videos.description: Scott Burnside and Pierre LeBrun recap the NHL All-Star Game with players rallying around John Scott who was named MVP and their thoughts on why the 3-on-3 format works.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Analysis (All-Star Game a success for NHL) 2016/01/31
